result.eng: I'll see you at three o'clock.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag a trí a chlog
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag a trí a chlog
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag a trí a chlogI'll see you at three o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag a trí a ċlogI'll see you at three o'clock.

result.eng: I'll see you at four o'clock.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar a chlog
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar a chlog
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar a chlogI'll see you at four o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag a ceaṫar a ċlogI'll see you at four o'clock.

result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceathar
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag a ceatharI'll see you at four.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag a ceaṫarI'll see you at four.

result.eng: I'll see you at half past nine.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag leath i ndiaidh a naoi
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag leath i ndiaidh a naoi
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag leath i ndiaidh a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag leaṫ i ndiaiḋ a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.

result.eng: I'll see you at half past nine.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag leathuair i ndiaidh a naoi
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag leathuair i ndiaidh a naoi
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag leathuair i ndiaidh a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag leaṫuair i ndiaiḋ a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.

result.eng: I'll see you at half past nine.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag leathuair tar éis a naoi
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag leathuair tar éis a naoi
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag leathuair tar éis a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag leaṫuair tar éis a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.

result.eng: You will see the shop on the right.
result.ga: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheis
result.orig: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheis
result.html: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheisYou will see the shop on the right.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ tú an siopa ar ḋeisYou will see the shop on the right.

result.eng: You will see the house on your left-hand side.
result.ga: Feicfidh tú an teach ar thaobh do láimhe clé
result.orig: Feicfidh tú an teach ar thaobh do láimhe clé
result.html: Feicfidh tú an teach ar thaobh do láimhe cléYou will see the house on your left-hand side.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ tú an teaċ ar ṫaoḃ do láiṁe cléYou will see the house on your left-hand side.

result.eng: If you go out on a stormy day, you will see it.
result.ga: Má théann tú amach lá stoirme feicfidh tú é
result.orig: Má théann tú amach lá stoirme feicfidh tú é
result.html: Má théann tú amach lá stoirme feicfidh tú éIf you go out on a stormy day, you will see it.
result.ponchtml: Má ṫéann tú amaċ lá stoirme feicfiḋ tú éIf you go out on a stormy day, you will see it.

result.eng: I will see what is happening there, excuse me.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéal
result.orig: Feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéal
result.html: Feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéalI will see what is happening there, excuse me.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gaḃ mo leiṫscéalI will see what is happening there, excuse me.

result.eng: We will see you some other time.
result.ga: Feicfidh muid sibh am éicint eile
result.orig: Feicfidh muid sibh am éicint eile
result.html: Feicfidh muid sibh am éicint eileWe will see you some other time.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ muid siḃ am éicint eileWe will see you some other time.

result.eng: Go down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ga: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaithe
result.orig: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaithe
result.html: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaitheGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ponchtml: Téigí síos an bóṫar sin agus feicfiḋ siḃ stad na mbusanna ansin ar Ṡráid na gCeannaiṫeGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.

result.eng: I'll see you on Friday night, God willing.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé oíche Aoine thú le cúnamh Dé
result.orig: Feicfidh mé oíche Aoine thú le cúnamh Dé
result.html: Feicfidh mé oíche Aoine thú le cúnamh DéI'll see you on Friday night, God willing.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé oíċe Aoine ṫú le cúnaṁ DéI'll see you on Friday night, God willing.

result.eng: I'll see you in twenty minutes' time.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú i gceann fiche nóiméad
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú i gceann fiche nóiméad
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú i gceann fiche nóiméadI'll see you in twenty minutes' time.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú i gceann fiċe nóiméadI'll see you in twenty minutes' time.

result.eng: Goodbye, Éilís. I'll see you tomorrow.
result.ga: Slán leat a Éilís Feicfidh mé amárach tú
result.orig: Slán leat a Éilís Feicfidh mé amárach tú
result.html: Slán leat a Éilís Feicfidh mé amárach túGoodbye, Éilís. I'll see you tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Slán leat a Éilís Feicfiḋ mé amáraċ túGoodbye, Éilís. I'll see you tomorrow.

result.eng: Goodbye, Séamas. I'll see you tomorrow.
result.ga: Slán agat a Shéamais Feicfidh mé amárach tú
result.orig: Slán agat a Shéamais Feicfidh mé amárach tú
result.html: Slán agat a Shéamais Feicfidh mé amárach túGoodbye, Séamas. I'll see you tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Slán agat a Ṡéamais Feicfiḋ mé amáraċ túGoodbye, Séamas. I'll see you tomorrow.

result.eng: You will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ga: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.orig: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.html: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libhYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ siḃ sceaċa a ḃfuil deilgne orṫu Má éiríonn liḃ na sceaċa deilgneaċa a ċur díḃ beiḋ an lá liḃYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
